channel.title: Player bonus list?
channel.description: itd be nice if some one could [b]nicely[/b] hand out a player bonus list for me all it know that [code]int StrBonus = playerBonus[10]; //Strength Bonus[/code] is strength (duh lol) but i dont quite understand how it managed to get 10? thats why a list would help
